body.name: Projection Alarm Clock, Digital Clock with 180° Rotatable Projector, 3-Level Brightness Dimmer, Clear LED Display, USB Charger, Progressive Volume, 9mins Snooze,12/24H, for Bedroom

features: INTEGRATED PROJECTOR WITH A SHARP AND CLEAR IMAGE -- The arm of this digital clock swivels 180 degrees for optimum positioning, getting the fine and smooth time figure image on the wall or ceiling at the appropriate distance of 1.64-11.4ft(0.5-3m). The edges of the projected numerals are surprisingly sharp and clear without having to fiddle with a focus adjustment offered on some other projection clocks.

LARGE LED DISPLAY & 3 BRIGHTNESS LEVELS -- The curved screen with 3.4*1.7inch large digits is easy to read in the dark, even when you are not quite awake or without your glasses. With 3 adjustable levels, you can dial down it to a level that is readable in the daytime but unobtrusive at night. It allows you to separately adjust the brightness of the face display and the projection display.

CHARGE USB PORT AND MICRO USB CABLE -- This digital alarm clock includes a 5V/1A USB output interface that will allow you to still charge your phone or other mobile devices while the clock occupies an outlet, very good for phone battery health.

ALARM WITH PROGRESSIVE BUZZER VOLUME -- This particular clock for bedroom comes with a progressive buzzer volume(75dB), the sound will get louder and faster, which is friendly for heavy sleepers who won't get used to the sudden loud sound. And pressing the big SNOOZE button at the top, you can get extra precious 9 minutes of sleep till the next loop of this alarm.

BIG BUTTONS & EASY TO USE -- This digital clock has large control buttons which are conveniently lined up along the top of the case and are clearly marked with easily understood icons. Therefore, it is easier to reach and use without changing all the other settings. Friendly to operate for kids, seniors or the elder.

BUILT-IN BACKUP BATTERY -- The package contains an AC adapter(AC100-240V,50/60Hz) to power the digital clock. When the power is off unexpectedly, the button cell battery(CR2032) built into the bedside clock can automatically save time & alarm settings (the time is not displayed and the alarm won't go off), no need to reset it again when the power is on.

STYLISH AND UNIQUE CURVED DESIGN -- A curved screen mimics your eyes’ curvature for a more comfortable viewing experience and also can improve your health, too. Research Gate reports that a Harvard Medical School study found curved screens are better at reducing eyestrain and blurred vision and improving focus compared to regular screens.

A GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION -- This digital clock is a great choice to show your care, and an unusual idea to surprise. A perfect gift for everyone, no matter for old or young, men or women, boy or girl. Also suitable for any festival like birthdays, Christmas, New Year's Day, Thanksgiving Day, Valentine’s Day, Father's Day, Mother's Day, etc.

productInformation.name: Theme
productInformation.value: Reading the time on your alarm clock when you first wake up isn’t the easiest, which is why projection clocks are a time saver. This digital clock displays the time on your ceiling or wall large enough so you can read it, even without your glasses on. You don’t have to squint at a small clock display, and you may not even need to roll over in bed to see what time it is., Gift, Home Decor, Love, Valentine's Day

With its larger-than-life display, this wall clock ensures you'll never miss a minute again! Click Here Wireless Charging Alarm Clock with RGB Light Let this fashionable clock make a modern twist to your bedroom! Every special day like Christmas, Valentine's Day, and Mother's Day, this clock appears and it can carry your love to them. If you are obsessed with RGB aesthetics, you'll go nuts over this alarm clock. It's a practical gift for Birthday or Christmas! Click Here

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product to check the time on the ceiling during sleep hours
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these as gifts for many of my family members at Christmas. Initially, my husband and I had this ceiling light alarm and found it to be so useful. No more turning on a light to see the time or just laying their twisting in bed to see the time on a headboard or bedside alarm clock. The level of brightness does not distract you from sleeping. The numerals are large and easy to read. We are retired so have not used the alarm a lot, but is available and functional I'd you need it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to read - large / bright letters
reviews.reviewText: This clock is awesome and exactly what I wanted. I kept craning my neck in bed trying to look at the clock on my headboard, so I wanted a clock that would project on the ceiling or wall. I installed it on the headboard and pointed it towards the opposite wall, a distance of about 14 feet. The size of the numbers at that distance is about 1 ft high so they're easy to see. It has 3 settings for brightness: Off, Low, High. So if you don't want the display on the wall you can easily turn that off. The only problem I have is when the sun comes up and the room starts getting bright, then it's hard to see the numbers. But I can just raise my hand up to use it as a display surface, and voila, the numbers can be seen on my hand. You really can't beat this clock for the features and price,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You can flip the projection display!
reviews.reviewText: We bought this clock for my son because he stayed at a grandparents house and they had a projection clock and he thought it was so cool. Everything about the clock is pretty good and it has lots of options for making it brighter or dimmer and we like that we could get it blue instead of red. But we were so confused that the projection on the ceiling was upside down, so I came back to this page to see if other people left a review to say the same thing. One of them said you need to hold down the projection display button to flip the image. That worked and now we are much happier with it overall. 😅

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top notch clock that meets all expectations as described
reviews.reviewText: The brightness of the projection is adjustable. Super nice clock, easy to set and was exactly what I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to see
reviews.reviewText: Bought it so I could see the time on the ceiling since my cat is usually in the way of seeing anything on the chest. This works perfectly and is a nice subdued green

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this clock. So easy to set up. 3 different dimmer levels. It also has different sizes that view on the ceiling. I got the soothing blue color and am so happy with this clock. It is also small so does not take up so much room. Am going to buy another one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure about the projection but I love it. I always want to know what time it is if I wake in the night. This projects it very large on the wall so you don't have to move your body to see the time just glance up at the wall. You are able to move the projection to many angles. You can dim to different levels. During the daylight you can't see the projection. Only at night in the dark. Its pretty cool. My husband says we are in the future lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well. Clear bright projection.
reviews.reviewText: This product is perfect…but for the fact that the clock is not self regulating to atomic time. It does keep good time though and the projection aspect is great. Like that the on-clock display can be turned off while the projected display remains on.
Nice and bright. Image on the ceiling is big. Sure nice to not have to raise up in bed and look over my wife to see the clock on her side table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Well designed, simple to set up.
reviews.reviewText: Nice digital clock with a large display and a projecting light which is adjustable in brightness and direction. The row of buttons on top make for easy and intuitive setting up, but if you can't work it out the manual is clear and readable for a change. The curved footprint makes for stability and the USB charger outlet is useful if you had to give up a mains socket for the clock. but the clock is very light and can easily be accidentally move6 out of position. Another plus is the battery backup which saves your settings if you lose mains power. Good value item.

While there are far cheaper ways to tell the time in your room, this is one cool clock. I love its two main features – crisp red digital numbers visible all day long and the red projected display on the ceiling visible clearly at night even if you're not wearing glasses. Light intensities of both displays are variable. The clock is quite lightweight. The only drawback is that it needs to be plugged into the mains. I wish it had a provision for rechargeable batteries.

reviews.reviewTitle: Die Projektion ist keine Spielerei, sondern absolut nützlich und sorgt für ungestörten Schlaf.
reviews.reviewText: Der Wecker ist ein Wecker, soweit funktioniert er wie alle anderen auch.Das Besondere ist die große rote Leuchtschrift und die Projektion.Wer eine Brille trägt, kennt das Problem, dass er nachts aufwacht und um zu wissen, wieviel Uhr es ist erstmal zur Brille greifen oder beim Wecker das Licht einschalten muss.Die große rote Leuchtschrift ist auch im Halbschlaf gut zu erkennen und das Zimmer bleibt trotzdem absolut dunkel. Für unser Doppelbett hat der eine den Blick auf den Wecker, der andere sieht die Uhrzeit an die Wand projiziert. Perfekt.Kurz aufgewacht, 1 Blick, weiterschlafen.Fotografieren läßt sich das leider nicht, weil ja das Zimmer selbst absolut dunkel bleibt.Sehr empfehlenswert.
